overview:
Results-oriented leader and accomplished professional with a proven history of success in driving profitable revenue growth who possesses a creative, strategic & tactical skill set which creates brand and product value for media and technology companies in the online space. Areas of expertise are business development and customer acquisition, customer retention, building winning teams within hyper-growth environments, training and mentoring sales professionals.

My focus is creating solutions for SaaS, PaaS,E-commerce, Social Media, Gaming, and Start-ups.

I also have an extensive background in Software, SaaS, Web 2.0/3.0, Virtualization, ITIL, BSM, Cloud Computing, Analytics, Social Marketing, Gaming, Web Design, Security, Storage, Networking.
